title: [Health] Hepatitis E virus is highly resistant to alcohol-based disinfectants. The alcoholic components dissolve the lipid envelope, but the resulting "naked" viruses are still infectious. The decisive advantage was a product that contains phosphoric acid as well as alcohol.
